column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I love coming here.  AIC has such a fantastic collection of cool
column2: brilliant and/or famous stuff from nearly every period. The place is huge with lots of stuff to see for whatever time frame you have available. The building doesn't feel overwhelming big though
column3: it feels inviting.  The two shops are also great
column4: and there's a cafe to grab a bite to eat or a drink.
